About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Mahamad Qaium Shah. I am a web developer, programmer, designer and an enterpreneur, interested in building user friendly application to help get maximum user attention to the business. I am oriented to programming various software in different platforms like desktop, mobile and web with latest technologies. With my experience, business like yours can assure their quality from designs to artitecture of the software.

Work Experience

Boost Turku Ry

Graphic Designer
2019-2020

I created numerous amount of promotional pumplets, tshirt, logo, social media posters, videos and website design for Boost Turku. Following that, I volunteered different events organised by the company related to startup companies.

Abo Akademi University

Lab Internship on Event-B model Animation
2019

I developed the animation for the pre-existed model of the software created in Rodin platform using Rodin, ProB, BMotion Studio, JavaScript, HTML and CSS3. My task included, animating the functionality of the model in visual representation.

Abo Akademi University

UI/UX Designer
2018-2019

I designed the user interface of the react-native application we build for our project Sonary at Project Course held in Abo Akademi University, using Photoshop, Illustrator and Sketch. Also, I designed posters and banners for events associated in the course.

Ask Me International

Junior Web Designer and Developer
2014-2015

I designed and developed a comic pictures portal websites for the company. It was a single man job using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, php, and mysqli. It took me almost a year to complete the project. And I made this project as my Bachelor's degree thesis.

Enterprise Engine

Junior Frontend Designer
2013-2014

It was my first frontend designer job and I was working as an intern for the company. I used wordpress, html and css for the project. I also helped the company in the R&D on plagerism websites. I created a whole research paper for the company.

Microsoft Education Support Center

Junior Application Specialist
2011-2012

I have strong background in networking as well which made me selected 2 out of 200 applicants for this position. I worked 1 year learning and testing windows server 2008 R2 in real server during this year.
